title: Who with me?
firstStepDescription: Just specify the cities of departure and arrival, and also date to see the list of drivers who offers trips along your route, and to choose suitable.
secondStepDescription: Ask the driver the questions interesting you and find out trip details. If this option suits you, reserve the place.
lastStepDescription: Arrive on time on the planned meeting place! Don't forget to take with yourself cash to pay the driver the coordinated sum during a trip.
author: Made by Kirill Malyhin
